description: On mountain missions where you want to move quickly with a light pack, these three-layer trousers offer excellent weather protection and mobility. The light, stretchy and breathable Eco-Shell f abric blocks rain and high winds, and makes them easy to compress into a backpack. Great as a reinforcement layer, as the full-length Aquaguard side zippers allow for easy ventilation and putting on/taking off.
name: Fjallraven Bergtagen Lite Eco-Shell Trousers - Mens
